Name: Your name
update_profile_information: Update your account's profile information and email address.
saving_goal_reach_date: Date you will reach your goal
Item Price: Price  of the item you want to buy
pick_date_strategy_definition: Decide the date you want to reach your saving goal. Then, we will show you how much money you need to put aside on a regular basis to reach that goal.
enter_saving_amount_strategy_definition: Or, tell us how much money you want to put aside regularly, then we will tell you when you will reach that goal.
price_whole_numbers_only: You can put only numbers in this field. No comma, no dot, no letters
Extra Savings Tooltip Info: We rounded your savings amount to avoid dealing with fractional contributions in your periodic deposits. This extra amount comes from that adjustment.
paused_message: Piggy bank is paused. Activate it first to change the status of your savings.
piggy_bank_paused_info: You paused saving. When you decide to continue, simply activate your piggy bank.
piggy_bank_resumed_schedule_updated_info: You resumed your piggy bank and schedule updated.
You have successfully completed your sav: You have successfully completed your savings goal.
edit_cancelled_message: You cancelled editing. The changes you made weren't saved.
saving_reminder_message: This is a reminder for your saving #:saving_number of :amount :currency for your piggy bank ":piggy_bank_name" scheduled for today (:date).
saving_reminder_unsubscribe_notice: If you would like to stop receiving these reminders, you can update your notification preferences in your piggy bank settings.
